name: simple level editer
description:
I spelled it 2 different ways so I'm guaranteed to spell it wrong at least once (I don't care that spellcheck exists, don't make me change the name of my file)

WASD to move

0 enters edit mode-you can click to place blocks while in this mode. Hit 0 again to leave edit mode

x deletes blocks while editting

arrow keys make blocks change size, but only the right and down arrow keys work at the moment

r resets the player to their starting position if not editing

Please go into full screen, it's significantly easier to see if you do
